column2: Engine comm. Error
The device has experienced an internal hardware error.

1. Turn off the power by using the power switch, and then wait at least 30 seconds. 2. If a surge protector is being used, remove it. Plug the device directly into the wall socket. 3. Turn on the power and wait for the device to initialize.
Fuser Error Turn off then on
